name: Suiteness
headline: Book guaranteed connecting rooms and suites at hotels
description: Suiteness is the first online booking platform with access to an inventory of thousands of exclusive luxury hotel suites. Suiteness is carving a niche for itself in the international travel industry as the leading website dedicated solely to luxury suites and finding success with group travelers and families looking for a nice place to stay together.

founders.name: Kyle Killion, Founder
founders.description:
Founder of Suiteness, connector of hotel rooms, father of two.

Previously product at Apartmentlist, Yelp, and Coupa.

YC Badge: 0xf9be1f23ad412a3f0096fe6f6fc0c38ab042ac5c

founders.name: Robbie Bhathal
founders.description: Robbie Bhathal is the Founder & CEO of Brightflow AI, the fintech platform empowering small business owners to take control of their cash flow.Robbie started Brightflow AI–which has raised more than $19M in total funding, secured a $100M debt facility, and was named to the SMB Tech50 list– after facing the pain points of serving as CFO of The Flex Company and co-founder & CEO of Suiteness, which raised $20M+ and was invested in by Y Combinator. Robbie started his career in finance @ Rho Ventures

generated_description:
Suiteness is shaking up the travel industry in a pretty elegant way. Founded in 2012 and hailing from Oakland, California, this innovative company is the first online platform specifically devoted to booking luxury hotel suites and connecting rooms. If you've ever traveled with family or a group of friends, you'll know that finding the right accommodations can be a headache. Suiteness takes that hassle away, allowing you to book guaranteed connecting rooms and suites that accommodate everyone's needs without compromising comfort or style.

Part of the renowned Y Combinator's Summer 2016 batch, Suiteness has carved out a unique niche in a saturated market by focusing solely on luxury accommodations, making it a go-to resource for families and groups looking for upscale travel experiences. Their website showcases an impressive inventory of exclusive hotel suites across myriad destinations, including hot spots like Las Vegas, New York, Los Angeles, and Orlando, among others.

At its core, Suiteness champions the notion that travel should be enjoyable, not stressful. Their user-friendly site allows for searching connecting rooms easily—just look for the special “+” in the room names. With a team of only 7 employees but a vast reach into over 3,700 destination options, Suiteness is small in size but mighty in ambition.

Additionally, they also take social responsibility seriously. Suiteness donates 1% of its proceeds to local charities, exemplifying a commitment to give back while facilitating unforgettable travel experiences for its customers.

So, if you’re dreaming of a luxurious getaway that allows your group to stay connected, Suiteness is your ticket to convenience and indulgence. Check them out at [Suiteness.com](https://www.suiteness.com).
